German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

verkaufen +‎ -er. Cognate with Dutch verkoper.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /fɛɐ̯ˈkɔɪ̯fɐ/
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Verkäufer m (genitive Verkäufers, plural Verkäufer, female Verkäuferin)

  1. agent noun of verkaufen
    1. seller (one who sells something)
    2. salesclerk, salesman; shop assistant; vendor (one whose profession is to sell things)
